Bajaj Finance Orders.questionTitle: Are there any benefits of renewing Bajaj Finance FD?
Bajaj Finance Orders.answerText: Yes. An additional rate of 0.10% p.a. (for deposit size up to ₹5 Crore) is applicable on renewal.
Bajaj Finance Orders.feedback: renewing Bajaj Finance fd, starting again Bajaj Finance fd, redo fd, restart fd

Bajaj Finance Orders.questionTitle: How to change my bank account details for Bajaj Finance FD?
Bajaj Finance Orders.answerText: Download the 'change of bank details form' by pressing the 'DOWNLOAD FORM' button below and submit it at your nearest branch. The list of branches is available on Bajaj Finance website.
Bajaj Finance Orders.feedback: change bank account, change bank, get money in different bank account, edit bank, linked bank, groww bank account, i want to change, how to change

Bajaj Finance Orders.questionTitle: How will I receive Bajaj Finance - Fixed Deposit Receipt?
Bajaj Finance Orders.answerText: Bajaj Finance will courier Fixed Deposit Receipt (FDR) certificate to your registered address within 3 weeks of opening the FD.
Bajaj Finance Orders.feedback: fd proof, fd statement, deposit statement, deposit receipt, deposit confirmation

Bajaj Finance Orders.questionTitle: I have lost my FD certificate/Receipt for Bajaj Finance FD. How to get a new FD certificate?
Bajaj Finance Orders.answerText: Please submit a written request duly signed by all the FD account holders at your nearest branch. The list of branches is available on Bajaj Finance website.

Bajaj Finance Orders.questionTitle: My issue is not listed here.
Bajaj Finance Orders.answerText: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!

Bajaj Finance Orders.questionTitle: What happens to my FD if I go abroad and become an NRI?
Bajaj Finance Orders.answerText:
In such a case, you have to inform Bajaj Finance Ltd by writing an email to fd@bajajfinserv.in, and submitting relevant documents. 

From the date of receipt of such documents, they will change the status of the deposit as NRI and taxation guidelines will apply accordingly.

DEFAULT.questionTitle: How do I get the fixed deposit advice/proof?
DEFAULT.answerText: Fixed deposit advice/proof will be sent to your registered email address within 1 working day of issuance of your fixed deposit.
DEFAULT.feedback: fd proof, fd statement, deposit statement, deposit receipt, deposit confirmation

Payment.questionTitle: How do I track my FD transaction?
Payment.answerText:
Press the 'MY ORDERS' button below to see your FD transactions. 

Note: If the amount has been deducted from your account but is not reflecting, then it will be refunded back to your account in 2-3 working days.
Payment.feedback: fd order, deposit order, see fd order, fd transaction

Payment.questionTitle: Where will my fixed deposit amount get credited after maturity?
Payment.answerText: Once matured, your fixed deposit amount will be credited to the same bank account you used for payment.
Payment.feedback: which bank account after maturity, after maturity

Payment.questionTitle: Why can't I use Groww Balance for FDs?
Payment.answerText:
Due to banking regulations, money in your Groww Balance cannot be used for FDs. 

All FD transactions have to be between your bank account (added on Groww) and the FD issuing bank directly.
Payment.feedback: groww balance, wallet, pay for fd, groww balance, fd

Payment.questionTitle: Why did my fixed deposit investment fail?
Payment.answerText:
Your fixed deposit investment may fail due to:

-incorrect/mismatched data in the KYC documents submitted resulting in KYC rejection
-payment issues while booking the fixed deposit

Please re-upload your documents or retry making the payment.

If this is a recurring issue, please raise a ticket. We'll resolve this issue as soon as possible.

Refund.questionTitle: My fixed deposit order failed. When will I get the refund?
Refund.answerText: You will receive the refund amount in your bank account within 5-7 working days.
Refund.feedback: fd order failed, order fail, fd refund, fd money back

Getting Started.questionTitle: Can I import my external fixed deposits into Groww?
Getting Started.answerText: Currently, we do not have that feature. We will notify you if external fixed deposit importing is introduced on Groww.
Getting Started.feedback: move fd, transfer fd, import fd, track fd

Getting Started.questionTitle: Can I register nominee for my FD?
Getting Started.answerText: Yes, you can register a nominee while onboarding for fixed deposits.
Getting Started.feedback: add nominee, family, parent, spouse, husband, wife, child, son, daughter, join nominee, apply for nominee, I want to change

Getting Started.questionTitle: Do I need a savings account with the bank for opening a fixed deposit?
Getting Started.answerText: No, you can open a fixed deposit with any of the available banks on Groww without having any prior relationship or a savings account with that bank.

Getting Started.questionTitle: How much time does it take to open a fixed deposit?
Getting Started.answerText:
Opening a fixed deposit is subject to KYC verification. 

Usually, it gets verified the same day as the payment or the next working day.

Getting Started.questionTitle: How to access to FD investing on Groww?
Getting Started.answerText:
We are gradually rolling out FD on Groww to all our users. 

If you want access to fixed deposit (FD) investment on Groww, please fill the form by pressing the button below.

About.questionTitle: How many fixed deposits can I open?
About.answerText: If your KYC is verified, you can open as many fixed deposits as you wish. However, till your KYC is under process, you can place only one order for opening a fixed deposit.
About.feedback: how many fd, max fds, min fds

About.questionTitle: The bank has changed the interest rates. Will that be applicable to my existing deposit?
About.answerText:
No. FD is locked at a specific rate. You will continue to receive that rate till maturity. 

If you wish to avail the new rate, you need to invest in a new fixed deposit.
About.feedback: new rates, change interest rate, new interest, which rate

About.answerText:
Tax-saver deposits are a type of fixed deposits. 

If you invest in tax-saver deposits, you can get tax deductions of up to Rs.1.5 lakh in a financial year under section 80C of the Income Tax Act. 

The lock-in period for tax-saver deposits is 5 years (minimum).
About.feedback: tax FD, tax saver FD, tax saver deposit

About.questionTitle: What is the minimum/maximum amount for opening a fixed deposit?
About.answerText:
The amount for opening a fixed deposit may vary based on the type of fixed deposit.

Please refer to the ‘Deposit Details’ section of any fixed deposit for more information.
About.feedback: fd amount, fd least amount, fd highest amount

About.questionTitle: What is the minimum/maximum tenure for opening a fixed deposit?
About.answerText:
You can choose any tenure between 7 days and 10 years. 

It also depends on the products offered by the bank.
About.feedback: fd period, fd tenure, tenor, fd maturity, fd period, deposit period

Eligibility.questionTitle: My issue is not listed here.
Eligibility.answerText: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!

Eligibility.questionTitle: What is the eligibility for senior citizens fixed deposits?
Eligibility.answerText: Any individual above 60 years of age on the date of issuance of the fixed deposit will be considered as a senior citizen and will be eligible to avail higher interest rates.
Eligibility.feedback: senior citizen fd, deposit senior citizen, senior citizen eligibility

Eligibility.questionTitle: Who is eligible to invest in FDs through Groww?
Eligibility.answerText: A resident individual with more than 18 years of age as on date of application is eligible to invest FDs.

Bajaj Finance Tax.questionTitle: Can the Bajaj Finance FD be shown for tax exemption?
Bajaj Finance Tax.answerText: Bajaj Finance's FD investment cannot be shown as an investment under section 80C for tax deduction benefit.

Bajaj Finance Tax.questionTitle: How frequently is TDS deducted for Bajaj Finance Limited FD?
Bajaj Finance Tax.answerText: It is deducted on a quarterly basis.
Bajaj Finance Tax.feedback: tax deducted at source, fd tax, deposit tax

Bajaj Finance Tax.questionTitle: In spite of submitting form 15 G/H, my TDS got deducted for Bajaj Finance FD. Whom should I get in touch with?
Bajaj Finance Tax.answerText: You can send an email to fd@bajajfinserv.in. Bajaj Finance will initiate a refund if there is a refund owed.

Bajaj Finance Tax.questionTitle: What is the tax applicable on the Bajaj Finance FD?
Bajaj Finance Tax.answerText:
- Interest earned on FDs is taxable
- There is no tax deduction for interest amount up to Rs 5,000 in a year
- If interest exceeds Rs 5000 in a year, then tax will be deducted at a rate of 7.5%. However, tax will not be deducted in case of submission of the following forms:
- Form 15H – For Senior Citizens (60 years & above)
- Form 15G – For citizens with age < 60 years
However, if the interest amount for the year exceeds Rs 2,50,000 (Rs 5,00,000 in case of Senior Citizens) across all Bajaj Finance FDs, TDS will be deducted even if Form 15G/H has been submitted.
Bajaj Finance Tax.feedback: tax deducted at source, fd tax, deposit tax

Bajaj Finance Tax.questionTitle: When will TDS certificate be provided to the depositor of Bajaj Finance FD?
Bajaj Finance Tax.answerText: The TDS certificate will be emailed to the depositor every quarter.
Bajaj Finance Tax.feedback: tax, statement, income tax, tax deducted at source, fd tax, deposit tax

Form 15G/15H.answerText: It has to be done in the bank branch as of now. Coming soon on Groww!
Form 15G/15H.feedback: 15g, 15h, fd form, deposit form, fd tax, fixed deposit tax form,

DEFAULT Tax.questionTitle: How to get a TDS certificate for my fixed deposit?
DEFAULT Tax.answerText: You can download the TDS certificate from the bank’s website/app via net banking.

Tax Implication.questionTitle: What is the tax implication on FD?
Tax Implication.answerText: TDS of 10% is deducted by the bank if the annual interest earned is more than Rs 40000 or Rs 50000 in case of senior citizens.
Tax Implication.feedback: tax deducted at source, fd tax, deposit tax

Tax Saver.questionTitle: Can I withdraw a tax-saver FD before the maturity date?
Tax Saver.answerText: No, you can’t withdraw tax-saver deposits as they have a lock-in period of 5 years (minimum).
Tax Saver.feedback: break lock-in, take out money, before maturity date, before date,

Bajaj Finance Withdrawl.questionTitle: Can I withdraw my Bajaj Finance FD through Groww?
Bajaj Finance Withdrawl.answerText: Currently, you can't withdraw Bajaj Finance FD online through Groww.

Bajaj Finance Withdrawl.questionTitle: My issue is not listed here.
Bajaj Finance Withdrawl.answerText: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!

Bajaj Finance Withdrawl.questionTitle: What is the penalty of closing FD prematurely for Bajaj Finance Limited?
Bajaj Finance Withdrawl.answerText:
- Up to 3 Months – no withdrawal (lock-in period) 
- 3 to 6 Months – 0% interest
- 6 to < 12 Months – 3% lower than the lowest rate specified by Bajaj Finance at the time of placing the deposit
- 12 Months & above – 2% lower than the rate specified for the period for which the deposit has run
Bajaj Finance Withdrawl.feedback: close fd, fd charges, deposit charges, early close fd,

DEFAULT Withdrawl.questionTitle: Can I withdraw my fixed deposit before maturity?
DEFAULT Withdrawl.answerText:
Premature withdrawal of fixed deposits is not allowed for tax-saver deposits and monthly interest payout deposits.

Any other type of fixed deposit can be withdrawn before maturity. Please refer to the ‘FD Details’ section of any fixed deposit for premature penalty information.
DEFAULT Withdrawl.feedback: break lock-in, take out money, before maturity date, before date,

DEFAULT Withdrawl.questionTitle: How to withdraw/redeem my fixed deposit?
DEFAULT Withdrawl.answerText:
- Press the ‘DASHBOARD’ button below
- Next to the fixed deposit you want to withdraw, click on the menu with 3 dots
- Click on 'withdraw'
- Review if any penalty charges are applicable
- Proceed to confirm

Note: Currently, you can only withdraw the entire deposit amount on Groww and not a part of it.
DEFAULT Withdrawl.feedback: break fd, break fixed deposit, stop fd, withdraw from fd, take out money from fd

Equitas Bank.questionTitle: How to withdraw/redeem my Equitas Bank fixed deposit?
Equitas Bank.answerText:
- Press the ‘DEPOSITS’ button below
- Next to the fixed deposit you want to withdraw, click on the menu with 3 dots
- Click on 'withdraw'
- Review if any penalty charges are applicable
- Proceed to confirm

Note: Currently, you can only withdraw the entire deposit amount on Groww and not a part of it.
Equitas Bank.feedback: take money out, break fd, cancel fd, stop fd

Equitas Bank.questionTitle: What’s the penalty for premature withdrawal of Equitas Bank fixed deposit?
Equitas Bank.answerText:
A penalty of 1% on the applicable interest rate is applicable if your fixed deposit is less than 6 months old. After 6 months, no penalty will be charged for premature withdrawal.

Note: Premature withdrawal is not applicable for tax-saver deposits.

Equitas Bank.questionTitle: When will there be no penalty on premature withdrawals for Equitas Bank fixed deposit?
Equitas Bank.answerText:
No penalty will be applicable if your fixed deposit is more than 6 months old.

Note: Premature withdrawal is not applicable for tax-saver deposits.
Equitas Bank.feedback: close fd, fd charges, deposit charges, early close fd,

Other.questionTitle: How to open a fixed deposit using Groww?
Other.answerText:
- Tap on ‘DEPOSITS’ pressing the button below
- Select the bank you want to open your fixed deposit with
- Enter the amount you want to deposit
- Make the payment via UPI/Net banking

Done! Once verified by the bank, your fixed deposit will be updated in your Groww dashboard.

Other.questionTitle: How to track the KYC status of FD?
Other.answerText:
Here's how to track the KYC status of your FD:

- Press on ‘MY ORDERS’ button below
- Select the fixed deposit for which you want to check the status

You will be able to view the order tracking screen, which will give you an update on your order status.
